entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a character in the story who has black eyes and is suspicious of Harry. He recognizes the egg and parchment as belonging to Harry.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: Moody is a character in the story who is calm and seems to be unaware of Snape's suspicions.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a character in the story who is hiding from Snape using his Invisibility Cloak.

entities.name: egg
entities.description: The egg is an object that Snape recognizes as belonging to Harry.

entities.name: map
entities.description: The map is an object that Moody has in his hand.

entities.name: parchment
entities.description: The parchment is an object that Snape recognizes as belonging to Harry.

entities.name: invisibility cloak
entities.description: Harry's Invisibility Cloak allows him to hide from Snape.

entities.name: filch's arms
entities.description: Filch is holding the egg in his arms.

entities.name: place where harry was
entities.description: Snape tries to stare at the place where Harry is hiding.

relationships.description: Snape recognizes the egg as belonging to Harry.
Snape recognizes the parchment as belonging to Harry.
Moody has the map in his hand.
